intel.title: Vulnerability Scanning

intel.title: Network Traffic Analysis
intel.detail: Utilized Wireshark to filter and analyze captured packets, detecting patterns indicative of malware communication and unauthorized access

points: Mastered Linux commands for reconnaissance and exploitation processes
Identified high-risk vulnerabilities through hands-on ethical hacking practices

chain.title: Initial Access
chain.detail: Simulated exploitation of system vulnerabilities via ethical hacking techniques learned in self-study

chain.title: Execution
chain.detail: Automated threat intelligence analysis using Python scripts for command execution in simulated environments

chain.title: Privilege Escalation
chain.detail: Explored misconfigurations in Linux environments to simulate privilege escalation during penetration testing

points: Established simulated footholds through vulnerability exploitation
Integrated Python scripting for IDS/IPS functionalities
Mapped activities to MITRE ATT&CK framework for comprehensive reporting

logs.text: Identified suspicious phishing email in Mastercard simulation from unknown IP
Detected anomalous network traffic patterns using Wireshark analysis
Blocked potential data exfiltration attempt identified in packet captures
Normal system login verified through log analysis

packets.detail:
Source: 192.168.1.50
Destination: External C2 Server
Flags: SYN-ACK
Payload: Suspicious beaconing pattern

Source: 192.168.1.100
Destination: Internal Database
Method: SQL Injection Attempt
Data: Malformed query string

timeline.detail: Analyzed and reported phishing threats in Mastercard simulation
Developed procedures for security training in high-risk business areas
Produced recommendations to improve client's cybersecurity based on OILRIG analysis

playbook.title: Phishing Response
steps: Notify incident response team and implement training

playbook.title: Threat Containment
steps: Align with business objectives for IAM

points: Contained simulated breaches through rapid response
Communicated complex concepts via documentation and presentations
Improved organizational security training and procedures

evidence.title: Digital Device Analysis
bullets: Utilized Autopsy to analyze text and media data from devices
Applied digital forensics principles in real-world case simulations

evidence.title: Network Artifact Examination
bullets: Captured and filtered network traffic with Wireshark
Correlated packet data with security events for threat identification

points: Maintained chain of custody in forensic simulations
Findings: Initial vectors often phishing or misconfigurations
Recommendations: Strengthen email filters and access controls

heatmap.label: Identity and Access Management: Opportunities for improvement identified
Security Awareness Training: Effective in reducing risks
Vulnerability Management: Gaps in patching and scanning highlighted

points: Enhanced detections for advanced persistent threats like OILRIG
Validated IAM best practices in simulations
Reduced simulated incident response time through automation

projects.title: Building Luna AI Application

projects.outcome: Automated threat intelligence analysis, vulnerability scanning, and incident response processes

projects.outcome: Analyzed business areas for robust security training and implemented procedures

projects.title: Datacom Cybersecurity Simulation
